name: 2024 6th International Conference on Emerging Networks Technologies
content: Accepted papers will be published in the International Conference Proceedings. ICENT 2019&2020&2021&2022 papers have been indexed by EI compendex and Scopus! ICENT 2023 was successfully held in Okinawa, Japan during September 22-24, 2023, and all the accepted papers will be indexed by EI compendex and Scopus soon.
